answers.answer: Hi,A screening A1C is not recommended even if actively looking for diabetes. Depending on your age group, screening fasting blood glucose is recommended at intervals. Discuss with your provider and ask that any unnecessary labwork be excluded if you wish.Take care.

question: i am not a diabetic,however for the last two years nurse practioner  for my lab work doesa glucose serum along with mean blood glucose est. and a a1c is this necessary?very confused.  appreciate any light on this that you can give me
title: blood glucose
